name: GoDee
description:
GoDee is a shuttle service that provides affordable daily rides in Ho Chi Minh.
It is cheaper than a taxi, smarter than the bus and safer than a motorbike.

GoDee is changing the way people commute in big cities!

GoDee products are 2 in 1:
Service with for-hire qualified drivers and hand-picked new 16-seater vehicles.
Powerful iOS and Android applications for excellent customer experience.
